item.title: Wallpapers for El Capitan
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description:
We updated our app Wallpapery with a bunch of cool El Capitan wallpapers. These wallpapers are all hi-res wallpapers and capable of span multiple screens. If you haven’t yet downloaded Wallpapery for your Mac you should get hold of a copy immediately. Doing a tweet with #wallpapery might even do you eligable for a free … Continue reading Wallpapers for El Capitan

The post Wallpapers for El Capitan appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
item.content:encoded:
We updated our app Wallpapery with a bunch of cool El Capitan wallpapers. These wallpapers are all hi-res wallpapers and capable of span multiple screens.

If you haven’t yet downloaded Wallpapery for your Mac you should get hold of a copy immediately.

Doing a tweet with #wallpapery might even do you eligable for a free copy as a x-mas gift.

The post Wallpapers for El Capitan appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
